creator: 123payment@gmail.com

text:
The binary distributed by this project is httpd.exe.  The most recent Apache.exe
was part of Apache 1.3, a very ancient distribution.  Neither was linked to
msvcrt90.dll.  You likely need to go back to the easyphp support lists, since
this project has nothing to do with that distribution.  Closing as an invalid
report.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
